sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import CenterView from 'react-bootstrap/Container' class Notes extends React.Component{ render(){ return (

Welcome to my Note App!

Disclaimer:

Please do not store any sensitive information on this site!

Due to time constraints involving school and job applications the

database used to store notes is not encrypted.

The only information stored about your google account is your name and

a unique google identifier to keep your notes seperate from others, so

in the event the server is comprimised your google account will be safe.

Thank you!

) } } export default Notes
